eUKhost's Cloud VPS hosting offers many advantages over standard VPS hosting service due to the number of servers that are being used for a single cluster. The hosting of the VPS will be spread across the entire Cloud meaning that even if one of the servers in the Cloud does fail, there is going to be at least one other node available to replace the one which has crashed. With this advanced computing environment you can be rest assured that your server and the hosted websites/applications will be at all times.

Cloud VPS Hosting features:-

* 100% Uptime Guarantee.
* Complete Operating System isolation.
* Guaranteed Resources like CPU, RAM and storage space for your usage.
* Full Administrative level access via SSH/Remote Desktop.
* Private IP Addresses
